channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 08:26 Driven the threat of artobustril in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further messages.
item.description: 游릭 08:26 Driven the threat of artobustril in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
